summary:
I am the Founder & CEO of YourKitchen, a real estate platform which allows quick service restaurants to launch new locations with less risk and more reward. At YourKitchen, we are democratising access to restaurant growth and creating communities of exceptional food brands. Our infrastructure as a service solution is the first in The Netherlands and includes notable partners in hospitality and real estate.

In addition to that, I am the first ever captain of the first ever Saudi National Ski and Snowboarding team. I am competing along 5 other athletes to qualify for the 2022 Winter Olympic Games in Beijing. I compete under the individual snowboard cross event category regulated by FIS international skiing federation. I have been featured on the WSJ, The Olympic press room, The National, and Arab News. 

Prior to YourKitchen, I was the Vice President of European Transformations at McKinsey & Company. During my work as a turnaround management consultant, I focused on good-to-great transformations for large established corporations. I led teams of clients & consultants to develop and execute turnaround strategies which delivered an average CFO Audited net EBITDA improvement of 20%+ and in excess of USD 700Mn. I started my career as a generalist Business Analyst in the Dubai office where I did a number of public sector, banking, and real estate consulting projects. After 2 years in the Dubai office, I began a global rotation with McKinsey's fast growing Recovery and Transformation Practice. I worked on projects based in New York City, Paris, London, Chicago, and Shanghai. I was promoted to Associate and then transferred to the Amsterdam Office where I spent two years leading a good to great transformation for a large lighting client. I was promoted to Vice President November 2019 in the Amsterdam Office. Working at McKinsey for 5 years,taught me important skills in analytics, strategy, management, and finance. Furthermore, working in various regions taught me how to collaborate with a international group of individuals.   

Prior to McKinsey, I ran Shopster, a Blackstone backed Venture startup focused on combining online and brick and mortar retail experience. In 2015, I decided to halt operations and accept my full time offer at McKinsey. I believed the technology was too early in the adoption curve and I would benefit from learning the fundamentals of business at McKinsey.

awards.title: Royal Scholarship Recipient
awards.description: Given academic performance, extracurricular activities, and entrepreneurial experience, I received a full scholarship from the Saudi Arabian Public Investment Fund.

organizations.name: Undergraduate Business Society
organizations.position: Board of Directors - Consulting Committee Manager

profile_positions.description: With food delivery and at home dining increasingly becoming the main way people eat, the restaurant real estate sector needs to change. We are reinventing restaurant real estate and making it future proof. YourKitchen acquires central real estate and redevelops that into the food hall of the future: multiple private kitchens optimized for food takeout and delivery. This allows food brands to reach new markets with less risk and more reward when compared to traditional brick and mortar. In addition to that, our tech and software layers ensure our tenants are continuously generating more earnings — with less risk than ever before. Our mission is to democratize access to current or aspiring restaurateurs so that consumers can enjoy a variety of wonderful food brands. With food delivery markets exhibiting exponential growth, YourKitchen aims to enable a new wave of restaurants to thrive.
profile_positions.title: Founder & CEO (Exited)

company.name: Saudi Arabian Olympic Committee | اللجنة الأولمبية العربية السعودية

profile_positions.company: Saudi Olympic & Paralympic Committee | اللجنة الأولمبية والبارالمبية السعودية
profile_positions.description:
Selected as the Captain of the first-every Saudi Ski and Snowboard team. As part of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030, a team of 7 athletes was put together for an intensive training camp with hopes to qualify for the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics. I competed in the Snowboardercross events under FIS and oversaw the team competing in downhill and cross-country skiing. 

As the team captain, I worked on sponsorship deals, program management, athlete welfare, social media, and stakeholder management.
profile_positions.title: Athlete and Team Captain

profile_positions.description:
Results-driven executive with a proven track record of spearheading transformative initiatives at McKinsey & Company. As the Vice President of European Transformations, I have led cross-functional teams to deliver remarkable outcomes, including over 1 billion in bottom-line savings and exceptional returns to shareholders.

Throughout my tenure, I have demonstrated a keen ability to identify strategic opportunities, drive operational efficiencies, and optimize organizational performance. My expertise lies in orchestrating large-scale transformations that enhance competitiveness, drive growth, and create sustainable value.

Working closely with clients, I have successfully guided them through complex challenges, leveraging data-driven insights to develop innovative solutions. By implementing cutting-edge methodologies and best practices, I have facilitated organizational change, optimized processes, and achieved remarkable results within challenging timelines.

My leadership style emphasizes collaboration, fostering high-performing teams, and empowering individuals to unlock their full potential. Through effective stakeholder management and strong interpersonal skills, I have built lasting relationships with clients, executives, and colleagues alike, ensuring alignment and driving success.

As a thought leader in the industry, I regularly contribute to conferences and industry forums, sharing insights on transformational strategies, change management, and operational excellence. I am passionate about driving impactful change, leveraging my expertise to guide organizations toward sustainable growth and success.

Specialties: Strategic Transformation | Operational Excellence | Change Management | Stakeholder Engagement | Data-driven Insights | Leadership | Financial Optimization | Cross-functional Collaboration
profile_positions.title: Engagement Manager | Vice President @ McKinsey Transformation

profile_positions.location: New York, New York, United States
profile_positions.description:
Associate at McKinsey & Company, specializing in business turnarounds and transformations. I've worked extensively with Fortune 500 clients worldwide, driving strategic initiatives to revitalize underperforming organizations and foster sustainable growth.

With a deep understanding of the complexities involved, I guide clients through challenging situations, helping them navigate operational and financial obstacles. Using my analytical skills and industry expertise, I develop comprehensive strategies that deliver measurable results and create long-term value.

Working closely with executive teams, I conduct thorough diagnostic assessments to identify root causes and critical areas for improvement. This includes analyzing financial statements, assessing market dynamics, and evaluating operational inefficiencies. With these insights, I collaborate with clients to design and implement tailored solutions addressing their unique challenges.

As a trusted advisor, I foster strong client relationships, providing guidance throughout the transformation process. I facilitate cross-functional collaboration, ensuring alignment and buy-in from key stakeholders at all levels. Combining data-driven insights with effective change management techniques, I drive organizational buy-in and accelerate implementation.

Throughout my McKinsey career, I've demonstrated a passion for exceeding client expectations. I've achieved measurable impact, including increased profitability, streamlined operations, and enhanced customer experiences. I'm proud to be a strategic problem-solver, guiding organizations towards sustainable growth and long-term success.

Specialties: Business Turnarounds | Transformations | Financial Analysis | Operational Efficiency | Change Management | Stakeholder Engagement | Strategic Problem-Solving | Measurable Impact | Thought Leadership
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate

profile_positions.description:
Highly skilled business analyst with a strong foundation in driving operational excellence and delivering strategic solutions. As a Business Analyst, I possess a deep understanding of the unique Middle East business landscape and cultural dynamics. My experience in the region has equipped me with the ability to navigate complex challenges, adapt to diverse environments, and build strong relationships with stakeholders.

With expertise in data analysis, market research, and financial modeling, I provide valuable insights to drive informed decision-making and identify growth opportunities. I excel in conducting comprehensive market research and competitor analysis, enabling me to deliver strategic recommendations that enhance business performance and drive profitability.

Collaboration is at the core of my approach. I work closely with cross-functional teams, fostering effective communication, and leveraging diverse perspectives to develop innovative solutions. My ability to translate complex concepts into actionable plans has contributed to the successful implementation of business strategies, process improvements, and change initiatives.

Effective communication and stakeholder engagement are paramount in my work. I have facilitated workshops, conducted interviews, and led client presentations, showcasing my ability to convey insights and recommendations in a compelling manner. By building strong relationships and understanding the cultural nuances of the Middle East, I have fostered trust and achieved exceptional results.

If you are seeking a business analyst with expertise in the Middle East region, I invite you to connect. Let's explore how my analytical acumen, cultural intelligence, and collaborative approach can contribute to your organization's success.

Skills: Data Analysis | Market Research | Financial Modeling | Strategic Recommendations | Collaboration | Stakeholder Engagement | Effective Communication | Cultural Intelligence
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Results-focused intern at McKinsey & Company, driven to make a difference in the business world. I actively engaged in diverse client engagements, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver strategic recommendations and drive operational improvements. I harnessed analytical skills to gather and analyze data, drawing insights that informed decision-making.

As a proactive learner, I embraced new challenges and sought opportunities to expand my knowledge. I actively participated in brainstorming sessions, contributing innovative ideas that added value. My adaptability and willingness allowed me to contribute to various project stages.

Working with senior consultants, I gained a solid understanding of industry best practices and cutting-edge methodologies. I honed problem-solving abilities, refining critical thinking skills in complex business scenarios.

Moreover, I cultivated strong interpersonal skills, building effective relationships with team members and stakeholders. Through effective communication and collaboration, I contributed to a positive team environment.

I maximized learning opportunities, participating in training sessions, workshops, and mentorship programs, enhancing professional growth.

My McKinsey internship solidified my passion for making a meaningful impact. 

Specialties: Data Analysis | Problem-solving | Client Engagement | Collaboration | Continuous Learning | Critical Thinking | Communication Skills | Business Strategy | Operational Excellence
